mapper.sql: muc_name, show_name, muc_desc, muc_title, muc_pic, version
mapper.select: select muc_name,created_at,domain,(extract(epoch from date_trunc('MS', created_at))*1000 - 8*3600*1000) as t,registed_flag from user_register_mucs where created_at > to_timestamp(#{t}) and username = #{u} and host = #{d};

update muc_vcard_info
show_name = #{showName}, muc_desc = #{mucDesc}, muc_title = #{mucTitle}, muc_pic = #{mucPic}, version = cast(muc_vcard_info.version as integer)+ 1
where muc_name = #{mucName}
returning muc_name,show_name,muc_desc,muc_title,muc_pic,version
select count(*) from muc_vcard_info where muc_name = #{mucName}
select from muc_vcard_info where muc_name in #{id}
select count(*) from muc_room where name = #{mucName}
